commentary_sequence.speaker: Alex Chen
commentary_sequence.text: And we are underway here at Amerant Bank Arena! McDavid wins the opening faceoff against Barkov.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Mike Rodriguez
commentary_sequence.text: A clean win by McDavid there. That's a good start for the Oilers, getting possession early. Barkov will need to be sharper on those draws if Florida wants to control the puck.

game_context.commentary_focus: Opening faceoff and initial puck possession.
